title: Quinoa, couscous and farro salad with summer vegetables
ingredients: ['1.5 litres water, or as needed, divided', '230g quinoa', '150g Israeli couscous', '190g farro', '1 cucumber, seeded and chopped', '1/2 red onion, chopped', '1 orange or red pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 yellow squash, seeded and chopped', 'Lemon salad dressing', '120ml extra-virgin olive oil', '1 lemon, juiced', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '170g feta cheese, crumbled']
